item.description:
The Cleantech Startup Showcase will feature presentations by five innovative Israeli cleantech startups -- a mix of venture-backed and seed-stage companies -- in the fields of energy, water and green technology.

Presenting Companies:
Agam Energy Systems
Emefcy Bio-Energy Systems
High Check Control
Phoebus Energy
SOVNA

Company descriptions are available at http://www.cleanisrae...

The presentations will be broadcast live, via the Internet, to a location in Boston, and there will be an opportunity for the Boston audience to interact with the Israeli entrepreneurs. This event is organized in collaboration with CleanIsrael (www.cleanisrael.com ), the Israel-based partner of the Boston Israel Cleantech Alliance.

Please stay tuned for more details.
item.name: Cleantech Startup Showcase
